summary: Water quality is stable but temperature is below optimal range for tilapia.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH around 6.8-7.5 for optimal tilapia health.
Monitor TDS; ensure it stays within 300-500 ppm for plant growth.
Increase water temperature to 24-28°C for optimal tilapia growth.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.033 / 7.005 / 7.106 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 333.543 / 307.8 / 342.7 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 24.232 / 20.94 / 29.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
